issue.title: [Java] Support LargeList Type and add integration test with C++
issue.body:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6110?focusedCommentId=17045492) by Projjal Chanda (projjal):*
[~emkornfield@gmail.com] `[~wesm]` Can I help with this? Or any other blocking issues which might need help?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6110?focusedCommentId=17045633) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
`[~projjal]`  please do :).  There isn't a direct blocker but until Vectors support int64 indexing, the value of this will likely be limited.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6110?focusedCommentId=17151759) by Bryan Cutler (bryanc):*
